channel.title: Technology Development August on Penta Global
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Development August on Penta Global

item.title: TechLog: The Penta Account Model
item.description: Starting in August, as part of Penta’s 'universal connector' mission to be a global network that interoperates and interconnects with other projects and off-chain systems we are posting a series of technical documentation articles to Medium. The first of these outlines the Penta Account data model, and how it underpins the rest of the platform architecture.
